title: Christy Elliott
text: Christy Elliott (26 May 1951 – 17 April 2011) was an Irish <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20middleweight">men's light middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>.
